abstract: The maximum version of PencilKit to support.
overview:
## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKContentVersion/latest].

If you set this property to a value less than [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKContentVersion/latest], the canvas view limits the edits that a person can make so they’re compatible with the version of PencilKit you specify.

If you set this property, also set [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKToolPicker/maximumSupportedContentVersion] on any [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKToolPicker] you use.

# maximumSupportedContentVersion

**Instance Property**

The maximum version of PencilKit to support.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var maximumSupportedContentVersion: PKContentVersion { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKContentVersion/latest].

If you set this property to a value less than [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKContentVersion/latest], the canvas view limits the edits that a person can make so they’re compatible with the version of PencilKit you specify.

If you set this property, also set [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKToolPicker/maximumSupportedContentVersion] on any [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKToolPicker] you use.
title: maximumSupportedContentVersion
